name: Music_2903.wav
keywords: ['low quality audio', 'techno dance song', 'female voice', 'moderate tempo', 'programmed percussion', 'bass', 'synth bursts']
caption: This techno song features a female voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing a techno beat. The kick is played at every count. The hi-hi-hat is played on every 'and' of the count. The bass plays a disco pattern using the root notes of the chords being played. Synth bursts are played in between lines. This song can be played in a club. The audio quality is low.
